r.s: Provides a wrapper to the ImageMagick library.
r.d: Imagick is a native php extension to create and modify images using the ImageMagick API. This extension requires ImageMagick version 6.5.3-10+ and PHP 5.6.0+.
r.n: - Fixes: * Fixed compiling against PHP 8.5 * Fixed getImage(s)Blob return type
